name: Intellitrest
overview:
Intellitrest is a social platform for pursuing intellectual interests such as Astronomy, Poetry, Painting and many more. Currently there are more than 30 interests to pursue.

Intellitrest enables users to pursue their interests through Oxford style debates, connecting with experts, share their knowledge using articles, book reviews, external media objects, opinions and views.

Experts such as academia, museums and researchers from scientific institutions can verify their account as an expert, which will enable users to easily track their content.

In Oxford style debates users decide whom to debate with and it follows a specific structure. There will be no visitor who was passing by who just popped in, blurted some off-topic remark or spam or any flame wars like in a discussion forum. The in-built work flow alerts debate participants to add their statements. Other users can vote, comment and perform other social activities.
